channel.title: Help for a beginner - How to manage harware controllers
channel.description:
Hello everybody,
I'm at a very early stage with axoloti, I just created some patches, connected a midi keyboard etc.etc. I just want to go further and start to connect and handle knobs, sensors etc., could you link me some examples how to code in order to get the values from them and use these values to modify parameters in my patch?
Example, with arduino (quite familiar to me) I built a nice synth with knobs to control the ADSR and filters, a ribbon controller etc.etc., I just didn't understand how to do in axoloti.
Thank you very much in advance :smile:
